href="/wiki/Wikipedia:Reliable_sources" title="Wikipedia:Reliable sources">reliable sources</a>.</div><p>This <b>list of battles</b> is organized <b> geographically, by country in its present territory</b>.</p><meta property="mw:PageProp/toc" /><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Afghanistan">Afghanistan</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a River">Battle of Wei River</a>  204 BC  <a href="/wiki/Chu%E2%80%93Han_Contention" title="ChuHan Contention">ChuHan Contention</a></li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Gaixia" title="Battle of (1902)">Battle of Riyadh (1902)</a>  <a href="/wiki/Ibn_Saud" title="Ibn Saud">Ibn Saud</a> recaptured <a href="/wiki/Riyadh" title="Riyadh">Riyadh</a> from Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Dilam" title="Battle of Dilam">Battle of Dilam</a>  (1903)  Ibn Saud victory over Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Bekeriyah_(1904)" class="mw-redirect" title="Battle of Bekeriyah (1904)">Battle of Bekeriyah (1904)</a>  Ibn Saud victory over Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Shinanah_(1904)" title="Battle of Shinanah (1904)">Battle of Shinanah (1904)</a>  Ibn Saud victory over Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Rawdat_Muhanna" title="Battle of Rawdat Muhanna">Battle of Rawdat Muhanna</a> (1906)  Ibn Saud victory over Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Tarafiyah_(1907)" title="Battle of Tarafiyah (1907)">Battle of Tarafiyah (1907)</a>  Ibn Saud victory over Rashidis.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Mecca_(1924)" title="Battle of Mecca (1924)">Battle of Mecca (1924)</a>  Ibn Saud captured <a href="/wiki/Mecca" title="Mecca">Mecca</a>.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Jeddah_(1925)" title="Battle of Jeddah (1925)">Battle of Jeddah (1925)</a>  Ibn Saud captured <a href="/wiki/Jeddah" title="Jeddah">Jeddah</a> and ended the <a href="/wiki/Kingdom_of_Hejaz" title="Kingdom of Hejaz">Kingdom of Hejaz</a>.</li><li><a href="/wiki/Battle_of_Khafji" title="Battle of Khafji">Battle of Khafji</a>  (1991)  Saudi, Qatari and American troops successfully regained control over <a href="/wiki/Khafji" title="Khafji">Khafji</a> from Iraqis.</li></ul><h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Scotland">Scotland</span><span class="mw-editsection"><span class="mw-editsection-bracket">[</span><a
